These Delphi units were written by others and can be used in Delphi applications

### GifImage.pas ###
* Originally written by Anders Melander and then adapted by Finn Tolderlund
	- See Anders Melander's website: http://melander.dk/delphi/gifimage/
	- See Finn Tolderlund's website: http://www.tolderlund.eu/delphi/
* To use, add GifImage.pas to your project's uses clause
	# Example (in .dpr): GIFImage in '..\Utils3rdParty\GIFImage.pas'
	- The application should automatically be able to load .gif images now
#
